channel.title: Need server help
channel.description: does anyone know why my server is acting like this, i price an item at 2b and instead of it being 2,000,000,000 it makes it priced at 2147483647??same with my other items ill price dharoks pieces 125m ea and it made them like 143,117,000??

item.title: Need server help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Sounds like somewhere in the shop assistant the price is being modified by some percentage to make it so you canâ€™t sell items for exact value as you bought them. Just find it in your shop assistant or handler and remove it

Read full topic
